name: Nami
text: On Play: If you have two or more rested {ODYSSEY} type Characters, up to one of your opponent's rested Don!! will not become active during your opponent's next Refresh Phase.

effect.text: If you have two or more rested {ODYSSEY} type Characters, up to one of your opponent's rested Don!! will not become active during your opponent's next Refresh Phase.
conditions: two or more rested {ODYSSEY} type Characters

meta.notes: Rarity is 'US' as printed on the card. The card has a 'SAMPLE' watermark, which is not part of the official card data.
